title: Lord, I'm Coming Home
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c v6 c

v1: I've wandered far away from God,
The paths of sin too long I've trod,
v2: I now repent with bitter tears,
v3: I'm tired of sin and straying, Lord,
I'll trust Thy love, believe Thy word;
v4: My soul is sick, my heart is sore,
My strength renew, my hope restore:
v5: My only hope, my only plea,
That Jesus died, and died for me;
v6: I need His cleansing blood, I know,
O wash me whiter than the snow;
c1: Open wide Thine arms of love;
